Package rqcode.patterns.temporal

Contains implementation temporal patterns in RQCODE.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AfterUntilUniversality
    Temporal requirements pattern: After Q Until R Universally P: After Q, it is always the case that P holds until R holds.
    Eventually
    Temporal requirements pattern: P always eventually holds
    GlobalResponseTimed
    Temporal requirements pattern: Globally, Real-time Response: Globally, it is always the case that if P holds, the S eventually holds within T time units.
    GlobalResponseUntil
    Temporal requirements pattern: Globally, it is always the case that if P holds then, unless R holds, Q will eventually hold
    GlobalUniversality
    Temporal requirements pattern: Globally, Universally: Globally, it is always the case that P holds.
    GlobalUniversalityTimed
    Temporal requirements pattern: Timed Globally, Universally: Globally, it is always the case that if P held for T time units, then S holds.
    MonitoringLoop
    This is the monitoring service that periodically checks the temporal properties.

Package rqcode.patterns.temporal Description

Contains implementation temporal patterns in RQCODE.
